title: Expert Advice on Cystic Fibrosis
text:
[]
User login
Expert Advice on Cystic Fibrosis
With ecorn-cf, patients, doctors, as well as other care team members should have easy access to expert knowledge and advice for cystic fibrosis.
You can
[ask questions](index.php?id=29) in this forum anonymously. In order to place an anonymous question, you have to make sure, you´re not logged in.
If you
[register](index.php?id=191) and login before you ask a question, we can inform you by E-Mail, as soon as your question is answered.
Your data, like name and email address, are only accessible to our experts. They are not visible for the public and are not made available to anybody else.
